scripts.live-admin: shx rm -rf ./public && shx cp -r ./public-admin ./public && cross-env REACT_APP_WHICH_APP=admin npm start
scripts.live-client: shx rm -rf ./public && shx cp -r ./public-client ./public && cross-env REACT_APP_WHICH_APP=client npm start
scripts.build: echo Please specify entry point: 'npm run build-game' or 'npm run build-admin'
scripts.build-admin: shx rm -rf ./public && shx cp -r ./public-admin ./public && cross-env PUBLIC_URL='/admin/' REACT_APP_WHICH_APP=admin react-scripts --max_old_space_size=768 build && shx rm -rf ./build-admin && shx mv ./build ./build-admin && shx rm -rf ./public
scripts.build-client: shx rm -rf ./public && shx cp -r ./public-client ./public && cross-env PUBLIC_URL='/' REACT_APP_WHICH_APP=client react-scripts --max_old_space_size=768 build && shx rm -rf ./build-client && shx mv ./build ./build-client && shx rm -rf ./public
